thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: Cam Jen Ronald
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Cam Jen Ronald

author: Cam Jen Ronald
title: Cam Jen Ronald
text: Excellent service from Trade Tested support team when a weather station purchased 8 months ago developed a fault. They contacted the suppliers in the USA and arranged to have me run a test and provide photos. A new station was provided, which is awesome. Great support and contact maintained throughout.
